DOC.brief_summary: This randomized phase III trial study whether change diet physical activity increase length survival without return cancer ( progression-free survival ) compare usual care patient previously treat stage II , III , IV ovarian , fallopian tube , primary peritoneal cancer . A healthy diet physical activity program counseling may help patient make healthy lifestyle choice . It yet know whether change diet exercise may help increase progression-free survival patient previously treat cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Diet Physical Activity Change Usual Care Improving Progression-Free Survival Patients With Previously Treated Stage II , III , IV Ovarian , Fallopian Tube , Primary Peritoneal Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . To determine woman disease-free successfully complete primary potential consolidation/maintenance , therapy stage II-IV ovarian , fallopian tube primary peritoneal cancer randomize healthy lifestyle intervention , significantly increase progression-free survival compare similar woman randomize usual care comparison group . SECONDARY OBJECTIVES : I . To determine woman randomize study intervention improve general quality life measure General Health subscale Research Development ( RAND ) 36-Item Health Survey ( RAND-36 ) . II . To determine woman randomize study intervention improve physical bowel functioning measure Physical Functioning subscale RAND-36 Gastrointestinal Symptom Rating Scale ( GSRS ) -Irritable Bowel Syndrome ( IBS ) , compare woman randomize usual care . TERTIARY OBJECTIVES : I . To assess patient compliance healthy lifestyle intervention analyze biomarkers ( e.g. , total carotenoid ) baseline , 6 , 12 , 24 month . II . To explore relationship carotenoid exposure progression free survival ovarian cancer . III . To examine patient compliance healthy lifestyle intervention ass type patient likely compliant healthy lifestyle intervention whether progression-free survival good among compliant individual . IV . To explore impact intervention aspect quality life pain , role limitation due physical health emotional problem , mental health , vitality , social functioning measure corresponding subscales RAND-36 . V. To explore impact intervention bowel function measure GSRS-IBS subscales . VI . To assess association subjectively measure sleep duration/quality ( use Pittsburgh Sleep Quality Scale ) , anthropometric measurement , self-reported dietary energy intake among woman previously treat stage II-IV ovarian primary peritoneal cancer . VII . To assess compare telomere length rate telomere shorten ovarian cancer survivor randomize lifestyle intervention versus standard care . VIII . To assess effect intervention biomarkers metabolic health measure change circulate insulin related insulin resistance , lipids inflammation . IX . To determine intervention effect biomarkers list modified baseline central adiposity . X . To determine intervention effect biomarkers list mediated change central adiposity . XI . To evaluate change central adiposity use computerized tomography ( CT ) scan data regularly schedule , routine surveillance CT scan determine change CT-specific visceral adiposity associate change biomarkers metabolic deregulation inflammation random subsample . OUTLINE : Participants randomize 1 2 group . GROUP 1 ( LIFESTYLE INTERVENTION ) : Participants receive dietary intervention design promote increase level plasma carotenoid , control weight , ensure adequacy micronutrient intake . Participants also undergo physical activity intervention comprise moderately low aerobic regimen raise usual activity level . Participants also undergo face-to-face counseling , receive educational material counsel focused read food label estimate gram fat per serve serve size , undergo telephone counseling lifestyle intervention counselor twice week 4 week , weekly 2 week , twice month 5 month , monthly subsequent 6 month , every month 12 month . Participants complete daily fat gram step diary least three time per week . GROUP 2 ( COMPARISON LIFESTYLE ) : Participants receive study notebook contain general study-related information . Participants ask record diet physical activity provide single sample diary study notebook . Participants receive telephone contact slide scale similar intervention group , le frequent interval ( 22 versus 33 call course intervention ) . After completion study , participant follow every 3 month 2 year , every 6 month 3 year , annually thereafter .

consolidation therapy define chemotherapy biological therapy use patient complete least four course primary chemotherapy document complete remission prior initiation chemotherapy ( chemo ) biological therapy Patients must achieve document complete response treatment base normal cancer antigen ( CA ) 125 ( per institution 's upper limit normal ) CT scan magnetic resonance imaging ( MRI ) contrast ( i.e . must clinical evidence persistent recurrent disease base CA125 CT scan MRI contrast ) Patients must Gynecologic Oncology Group ( GOG ) performance grade 0 , 1 , 2 Patients must currently enrol ongoing ( participate 6 month longer ) medically prescribe diet physical activity regimen Patients must chronic disease would preclude randomization lifestyle intervention trial ; disease include recent myocardial infarction unstable angina ( previous 6 month ) , chronic hepatitis , rheumatoid disease , renal hepatic disease/dysfunction diabetic receive insulin ; clinical condition limit ability walk ( recent leg fracture , significant osteoarthritis , related orthopedic condition , degenerative neurological condition , etc . ) Patients must serious psychiatric illness ( e.g . lifetime bipolar disorder , schizophrenia psychosis , serious personality disorder , severe major depressive disorder recent suicide psychiatric hospitalization ) ( previous 12 month ) Patients must complete preentry assessment Patients must sign approve informed consent authorization permit release personal health information Patients must willing provide name appropriate telephone contact information willing contact periodically via telephone The University Arizona Cancer Center ( AZCC ) staff completion individualize lifestyle intervention coaching , completion Pittsburgh Sleep Quality Index , clarification patientcompleted response necessary ; patient must willing Arizona Food Frequency Questionnaire ( AFFQ ) , Arizona Physical Activity Questionnaire ( APAQ ) , baseline questionnaire , personal contact information send AZCC Patients GOG performance grade 3 4 Patients may history invasive malignancy within last five year , exception nonmelanoma skin cancer stage 1A endometroid adenocarcinoma uterus Patients diagnose chronic disease/illness preclude participation ( i.e. , diabetic receive insulin , myocardial infarction unstable angina within previous 6 month , chronic hepatitis , rheumatoid disease , renal hepatic disease/dysfunction ) Patients histological diagnosis clinical stage I epithelial ovarian cancer , fallopian tube primary peritoneal carcinoma Patients currently undergo treatment ( primary consolidation ) stage II , III IV ovarian , fallopian tube primary peritoneal cancer complete treatment le six week ago Patients life expectancy le one year Patients body mass index ( BMI ) < 20 kg/m^2 Vegan vegetarians Patients enrol weight loss program take weight loss medication dietary supplement unwilling discontinue Patients participate marathon , triathlon , endurancerelated physical activity within previous 24 month Patients surgery weight loss
